### `files`

```
# .config/rome.rjson
// For configuration documentation see http://romefrontend.dev/#project-configuration
name: "project"
lint: {
	globals: [
		"unknownVariable"
]
}
root: true

# .editorconfig
[{*.js, *.rjson}]
end_of_line = lf
trim_trailing_whitespace = true
insert_final_newline = true
charset = utf-8
indent_style = tab
indent_size = 2


# index.js
unknownVariable;
window;


```
